title: ExoticAmbience1 SoundEffect
longDescription:
🎧️YoutubePreview


📖Overview.

The Exotic Ambience Sound Effects Pack is a diverse collection of audio resources suitable for games, movies, and animation projects. It features a wide variety of exotic ambience sounds, including African_Island, Birds_And_Cicadas, Birds_Of_Mexico, Frogs_And_Insects, Insect_Swells, Malaysian_Forest, Malaysian_Town, Mexican_Ambience, Western_Town, and more. With both stereo and mono audio files provided, these sounds offer flexibility for use in UI effects, location-specific in-game effects, and more.



🕹️Functionality.

  • Diverse Exotic Ambience: This pack includes a rich variety of exotic ambience sounds, capturing the atmosphere of different locations and settings.
  • Stereo and Mono Files: Stereo and mono audio files are separated, allowing versatile usage for UI effects, location-specific in-game effects, and more.
  • Versatile Applications: Suitable for various purposes in games, movies, animations, and more, especially scenes requiring exotic ambience.


📂FILES. (TrackList)

  • African_Island 27
  • Birds_And_Cicadas 5
  • Birds_Of_Mexico 12
  • Frogs_And_Insects 5
  • Insect_Swells 15
  • Malaysian_Forest 53
  • Malaysian_Town 38
  • Mexican_Ambience 13
  • Western_Town 23


⭐5STAR Review.

  • If you like the product, please leave a 5-star review! We always have a great communication with our customers. :D
  • Even if you don't have the sound you want, please leave a 5-star review and feedback! We will check the customer's review every two weeks and fill in the sound as possible every two weeks! We will also give you a relevant reply if your opinion is reflected :D


♬CopyrightFreeMusic Playlist

We provide copyright-free music (CC0) content that can be used in various fields such as games, movies, animations, YouTube, etc., to ensure the success of your projects. Please check out our YouTube channel playlist through the link below! All the music tracks have been composed and produced by us directly. Therefore, we can guarantee that they are very safe from copyright issues.


  • Youtube Playlist
  • Reselling and using for AI training purposes are explicitly prohibited. It must be used as part of personal and corporate projects only.
technicalDetails:
TECHNICAL INFORMATION.

  • Number of Audio Wavs: 191 (402 Mono and 402 Stereo)
  • Number of Audio Cues: 191 (402 Mono and 402 Stereo)
  • Sample rate : 44.1kHz (Standard)
  • Bit Rate : 320Kbps (Standard)
  • Bit Depth : 24bit Depth (Standard)
  • Do Sound FX loop: No
  • Minutes of audio provided: 01:27:13
  • Supported Development Platforms: All
  • Windows: Yes
  • Mac: Yes


LOUDNESS.

  • Average Short Term : -10LUFS ~
  • Average Long Trem : -12LUFS ~
  • Average Range : 12LU ~
  • Average Momentary : -8LUFS ~
  • Average Trim : 3.0 ~
  • TruePeak : 0dBTP
  • The loudness values (Short Term, Long Term, Range, Momentary, TruePeak, etc.) may vary depending on the theme, timbre, and character of sound effects.


SOUND EFFECT CREATION METHODS.

How to Create: This product has been produced in a professional studio.

Mixing & Mastering : Yes, This product has been mastered in a professional studio.
